common_issues.title: Pieces OS 11.4.2 bugs reported on Windows and macOS
common_issues.description: Users reported issues with Pieces OS 11.4.2, including Chrome plugin connection failures (v4.0.9 outdated), desktop app crashes on macOS when L.T.M 2.5 is enabled, and image pasting failures on Windows resulting in "Uuups" errors and GPT4.1 read failures.  No solutions were provided in the reports.

related_issues.title: Failed to connect to PiecesOS
related_issues.text:
Failed to connect to PiecesOS
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.4.2

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Chrome plugin doesn't work properly. I can't use the buttons and features, and the sidebar cannot establish connection either. Inside of Pieces desktop app it shows that the chrome plugin is outdated. However this is the newest I got from the chrome app store.

Plugin version: 4.0.9
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Pieces Desktop keeps crashing
related_issues.text:
Pieces Desktop keeps crashing
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.4.2

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I just updated Pieces to try out L.T.M 2.5, and I noticed that the software keeps stopping and restarting on its own. I checked for any updates I may have missed, and none. I restarted the software by forcing it to quit, but the issue persisted. 

The issue only happens when I turn on L.T.M. 
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Pasting images doesn't work.
related_issues.text:
Pasting images doesn't work.
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.4.2

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I paste an image, and I get after a while the "Uuups..." error response. GPT4.1 one tries to read the contents but fails. So pasting doesn't work.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Investigate and address the reported bugs related to Pieces OS 11.4.2, specifically Chrome plugin connection failures, desktop app crashes on macOS with L.T.M 2.5 enabled, and image pasting failures on Windows.
Update the Chrome plugin to the latest version to resolve connection issues.
Troubleshoot and fix the desktop app crashes on macOS when L.T.M 2.5 is enabled.
Resolve the image pasting failures on Windows and the associated "Uuups" errors and GPT4.1 read failures.
Provide users with temporary workarounds or solutions for these issues while a permanent fix is being developed.
Improve communication with users regarding the status of these issues and expected resolution timelines.
Monitor support tickets for any emerging trends or new issues related to Pieces OS 11.4.2 or other versions.
Consider implementing automated testing to catch these types of bugs before they reach users.
Review and update the error handling and messaging within the application to provide more informative and user-friendly error messages.
Investigate the GPT4.1 read failures and ensure proper integration with the Pieces OS application.
Review the L.T.M 2.5 feature for potential conflicts or bugs that may be causing the crashes on macOS.
Provide more detailed documentation or tutorials on how to use the Pieces OS application and its features, including the Chrome plugin and L.T.M 2.5.
Gather more data on the frequency and impact of these issues to prioritize development efforts.
Consider setting up a beta testing program to identify and address potential issues before major releases.
Implement better logging and error reporting within the application to facilitate faster debugging and troubleshooting.
